file_content.text: We should talk.
With your... previous relationship renewed, it would seem that ours has run its course.
Let's not belabor the situation with arguments or excuses. Agreed?
I owe you an apology, whether you want one or not. You've been so supportive... you deserve better.
You deserve an apology.
I agree. Thank you for understanding, Lana.
A clean break is best.
Yeah, sure, we're done. Was there anything else?
Whatever.
"Deserve" is a crutch for the weak. I take happiness where I find it. I can't blame you for doing the same.
Clearly not.
I... wish you the best.
Yeah. So.
I'm... glad you came.
Think you know why I called you here. With your... old flame back, well....
We're both professionals. You made your choice. No need for things to get messy.
I still care about you, Theron, even if--
What we had was real.
Thank you for not making this harder than it already is.
I appreciate that.
Could've settled this over a holocall.
Don't be so dramatic.
Please. Don't. I know you're trying to make me feel better, but....
I just want you to be happy. Even if it's not with me.
But.... No. Guess you're right.
I won't take up any more of your precious time.
Heard your... special someone's back in town.
It's been fun--you and I. But I know when to bow out.
You're a great guy, Koth. Really. I never meant to hurt you.
I'm sorry, Koth.
Graceful as ever, Vortena. Thank you.
Thanks for making this easy.
Good. Now get back to work.
Stop wasting my time.
The "great guy" line? Ouch.
Can't say I'm not disappointed, but....
Wow. That's how it's going to be. Okay.
Don't give me that look. I'll be fine. Just need some time.
